title: Sorcerer

fields.name: Light The Fuse (x1, Charge 120%, Locked):
fields.value: Unlocks at the start of Night 3. Target a player. If your Attack Power would kill them tonight, you turn them into a suicide bomb. Otherwise, the ammo for this ability is refunded. They will be informed of this at the end of the Night. A player who has been turned into a suicide bomb must choose a player to blow up during the next Day phase, which will hit both with a 1000% Attack Score attack. The victim will still blow up if they fail to choose a target.

fields.name: Oops, all Kaboom! (Passive):
fields.value: If you are nightkilled, you will blow up, hitting all of your visitors with an attack of your current Attack Power. If you die during the Evening, you will instead hit anyone currently sharing a Hello Neighbor with you.
